revised_title: Hermaphroditism in Lamprey and Myxine: An Intermediate Rank between Fishes and Vermes
tldr: Sir Everard Home discovers that lamprey and Myxine exhibit hermaphroditism, placing them in an intermediate rank between fishes and vermes. He finds that the organs previously thought to be kidneys in supposed females are actually testicles, and that supposed males are actually fish without spawn due to not breeding for two seasons consecutively.
